column4: is it safe to delete PQservice from my Laptop HD? If so can I then move my /home dir to that space?

PQService is a recovery partition built in by the manufacturer.  It will not harm ubuntu in any way to delete it but it will probably make windows freak out and it will make you unable to restore your windows installation ever again
I have recovery disks made from the data that partition when the the laptop was new do I still need the data in the partition
IDK, you tell me.  If you trust the recovery disks then sounds to me like you don't need that partition.
